outputs.output_descr: The proposed project aims at the reduction in the annual growth rate of GHG emissions from the operation of commercial buildings, i.e. hotels, hospitals, convention centers, shopping malls and office buildings, through the application of EE technologies and practices. The project objective is the "Facilitation and promotion of building energy efficiency technologies and practices in commercial buildings in Thailand." The focus will be on existing and new commercial buildings.

project_descr: Promoting Energy Efficiency in Commercial Buildings in Thailand (PEECB)
